shadow.name: COMPLEXITY
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Splitting Apart, expressing through complexity

gift.name: SIMPLICITY
gift.description: The gift frequency of Splitting Apart, expressing through simplicity

siddhi.name: QUINTESSENCE
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Splitting Apart, expressing through quintessence

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 23 shadow frequency. The complexity you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural simplicity. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from complexity to simplicity.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your throat. Notice the sensation of complexity.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 23 consciously for 7 days, the complexity pattern will shift toward simplicity.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 23 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from complexity toward simplicity
